Package com.codeborne.selenide.impl

Class ThreadLocalSelenideDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideDriver
      • com.codeborne.selenide.impl.ThreadLocalSelenideDriver
  • public class ThreadLocalSelenideDriver
extends SelenideDriver
    A `SelenideDriver` implementation which uses thread-local webdriver and proxy from `WebDriverRunner`.
    See Also:
    StaticConfig, StaticDriver
